Dataset Name: Recombinant T Cell Receptors that Bind to Mixed Lineage Leukemia (MLL) Specific Phosphopeptides
Dataset Description: Altered protein phosphorylation in cancer cells often leads to surface presentation of phosphopeptide neoantigens. However, their role in cancer immunogenicity remains unclear. Here we describe a mechanism by which an HLA-B*0702-specific acute myeloid leukemia phosphoneoantigen, pMLL747–755 (EPR(pS)PSHSM), is recognized by a cognate T cell receptor named TCR27, a candidate for cancer immunotherapy(Read more on Pubmed)
Dataset Design: Synthetic construct alpha chain of TCR (trav) gene, TRAV27*01 allele, complete cds
Dataset Assay: Cytotoxicity Assay, X-Ray Crystallography, Nuclear Magnetic Resonance
